package.name: ZetaPrints_Options
package.summary: Copy custom options from one product to selected products.
package.description: This extension allows to copy all custom options from one product to a selection of products. This way you can configure custom options once and reuse them easily.
package.notes: * Initial release. * On admin products page select products you want to copy to, then in mass action drop down select 'Copy Custom Options', then chooose source product and click submit. * changed dropdown for source product to input field * added small help note. * changed debug messages
